data.name: Goblins of Elderstone Demo
data.detailed_description:
Some features will be unavailable in the demo and once you’re in the game, your game time will be limited to only 1 hour.
The game is now in Beta development and even though we have come a long way, we still have many bugs and unexpected behaviours throughout the game. We will continue to balance features and fix bugs as we go and would greatly appreciate your help in doing so. Please join us on our Discord Server to take part in the growing community of goblins there and help us improve the game.
We have been releasing regular updates every month or two and will continue to do so until the game is completed - you can see the full patch note history on the title screen.
data.about_the_game:
Some features will be unavailable in the demo and once you’re in the game, your game time will be limited to only 1 hour.

data.short_description: We hope you enjoy this limited Demo of our game. Please feel free to join us over on Discord to give us feedback to improve the game and be part of our growing community.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
